channel.title: Website Info on My website
channel.description: Recent content in Website Info on My website

item.title: A Fresh Look on my website
item.description: Deprecated While talking to a good friend of mine, He recommended me a static site generator called Hugo. It is a quite a powerful tool and has many themes and support for templates from other web programming languages/markup languages. I won’t go into much detail now but it is how it is. Anyways, we both found this cool theme that we’re using right now and it is called hugo.386. It took me about 2-3 Hours to configure everything right along with some trial and error on some areas and now we’re here.
